tool_description:
Real-Time & Historical
World Weather Data API
Retrieve instant, accurate weather information for
any location in the world in lightweight JSON format
name: weatherstack
title: weatherstack

api_list.name: get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://weatherstack1.p.rapidapi.com/api.weatherstack.com/current"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weatherstack1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://weatherstack1.p.rapidapi.com/api.weatherstack.com/current"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weatherstack1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
